title: Mass Updator executor
description: This executor executes updates on several files

directories.description: The directory or directories, from the root of what is outputted by the build of the library, where we can expect to find the files to update

glob.description: The pattern, from the directory given in the associated option, to select which files to update

searchValues.description: The pattern(s) to detect a substring we want to replace in each file

flags.description: The flags to use when we need to detect the substring we want to replace in each file

replacements.description: The pattern(s), mostly with $1, $2 and so on, to replace the 'search' substring in each file

rewrite.description: If true, each file will be updated, if not, a duplicate with the updated content will be created

suffix.description: The suffix to add to each filename if 'rewrite' is false and we create duplicates
